text: Aur agar musalmanon ki do jamaten aapas mein larr paren to unn mein mail milaap kerwa diya kero. Phir agar unn dono mein say aik jamat doosri jamat per ziyadti keray to tum (sab) uss giroh say jo ziyadti kerta hai laro.yahan tak kay woh Allah kay hukum ki taraf lot aaye, agar lot aaye to phir insaf kay sath sulah kerado aur adal kero be-shak Allah Taalaa insaf kerney walon say mohabbat kerta hai
